flawed_nl_solution:
After the first hour of work, he has distributed newspapers to 2/5*200 = <<2/5*200=1000/2>>1000/2 homes
The number of homes that still need newspapers is 200-1000/2 = <<200-1000/2=-300>>-300
Two hours later, the number of homes he has distributed newspapers to is 60/100 * -300 = <<60/100*-300=-180>>-180 homes.
The number of homes he still needs to distribute newspapers to is -300--180 = <<-300--180=-120>>-120 homes
#### -120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 1000/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
